code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{changeFilterStatus,getFilteredDrinks,getFilteredMeals,setLastClickedFilter}from'../redux/actions';import'../index.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FilterButton(_ref){var strCategory=_ref.strCategory,currentPath=_ref.currentPath;var dispatch=useDispatch();var filterStatus=useSelector(function(state){return state.recipesReducer.filterStatus;});var lastClickedFilter=useSelector(function(state){return state.recipesReducer.lastClickedFilter;});var handleCategoryFilter=function handleCategoryFilter(category){if(category==='All'){dispatch(changeFilterStatus(false));setLastClickedFilter(category);return;}if(lastClickedFilter!==category){if(currentPath==='/meals')dispatch(getFilteredMeals(category));if(currentPath==='/drinks')dispatch(getFilteredDrinks(category));dispatch(changeFilterStatus(true));dispatch(setLastClickedFilter(category));}else if(lastClickedFilter===category){dispatch(changeFilterStatus(!filterStatus));dispatch(setLastClickedFilter(category));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return handleCategoryFilter(strCategory);},"data-testid":"".concat(strCategory,"-category-filter"),className:"btn-filter",children:strCategory},strCategory);}export default FilterButton;
